title: The Future of Software Engineering
description: A 1-minute de-risking session on The Future of Software Engineering.

hook.text: Every decade brings a new paradigm. The constant is change, and adaptability is the only survival skill.

buildup.text: Low-code, AI generation, and formal verification are all competing visions of the future.

discovery.text: The underlying challenge remains unchanged: build the right thing, at the right quality, at the right time.

twist.text: Tools change. Languages change. Human problems â€” communication, trust, and clarity â€” never change.

climax.text: The best engineers aren't attached to methods. They choose the right approach for the current problem.

punchline.text: Methods change. The craft of building endures.

quiz.question: What remains constant across software engineering eras?
options: Human challenges like communication and clarity
